channel.title: Gaetano Coppoletta - Personal Website
channel.description: Computer Science Graduate & Security Researcher focused on OCPP security and vulnerability research.

item.title: OCPPStorm: A Comprehensive Fuzzing Tool for OCPP Implementations
item.description: Research paper presented at Network and Distributed System Security (VehicleSec) 2024 - NDSS Symposium

item.title: Graduate Hourly Position at UIC
item.description: Developed OCPPStorm fuzzing tool, discovered 6 critical vulnerabilities resulting in 6 CVEs

item.title: Research Assistant at UIC
item.description: Worked on web security research, CVE replication, and vulnerability detection tools
